title: Amalgamation of plots / lands shall be permissible if they form a sizable plot from planning point of view and are contiguous
clause_text: Amalgamation of plots / lands shall be permissible if they form a sizable plot from planning point of view and are contiguous. Amenity and layout plot shall also be entitled for amalgamation provided amenity is developed on proportionate area.
